snippet.title: Brie Parmesan Mysteries - Crimes of Chicatgo
snippet.description: Take on the role of Brie Parmesan, master detective, a stealthy rat navigating the criminal underworld of Chicatgo in search of cheese and collecting evidence to solve crimes.  With a focus on strategy and avoidance, the player must outwit and outmaneuver the Cat Meowfia and other obstacles to uncover evidence and solve the case.  Follow Brie on his adventures as he collects evidence and avoids detection in the streets and speakeasies of Chicatgo.
